headline: Jim Cramer Recommends Buying Boeing
summary: The Boeing Company (NYSE:BA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer commented on. A caller asked for Cramer’s thoughts on the company during the lightning round, and he remarked, “Here’s my thoughts on Boeing, [buy, buy, buy, buy, buy, buy]. headline: Aviation Capital Group Announces Delivery of One Boeing 737-8 MAX to Virgin Australia
summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif., August 13, 2025--Aviation Capital Group LLC (ACG), a premier global full-service aircraft asset manager, announced the delivery of one Boeing 737-8 MAX aircraft to Virgin Australia. This is the third and final aircraft to deliver to the carrier from ACG’s order book with Boeing.

raw.headline: Aviation Capital Group Announces Delivery of One Boeing 737-8 MAX to Virgin Australia

headline: Boeing Defense Union Calls on Lawmakers to Intervene in Strike
summary: The IAM Union, which represents 3,200 workers currently on strike, said it had written letters to senators and representatives to press Boeing to return to the bargaining table, the group said in a statement on Wednesday.  A Boeing representative didn’t have an immediate comment.  The action adds pressure to Boeing’s turnaround efforts with the defense and space division contributing about a third of the company’s revenue.

headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From TransDigm’s Q2 Earnings Call
summary: TransDigm’s second quarter results were met with a significant negative market reaction as both revenue and non-GAAP profit missed Wall Street estimates. Management attributed the shortfall primarily to weaker-than-expected performance in its commercial OEM segment, which was affected by ongoing production issues at major aircraft manufacturers and inventory destocking.
